item.description: Bicycles Battling Cancer event is set to take place on Sunday, June 10, 2012, with a start/finish line at the Bolton Fairgrounds in Lancaster, MA, and the goal for this year is to engage 500 riders and raise over $500,000 for the fight against cancer. Each rider makes a fundraising commitment of $300, and receives an event jersey for raising $500 or more. The funds raised through Bicycles Battling Cancer support the American Cancer Society's life saving mission of creating a world with less cancer and more birthdays! To register for this event, or to learn more, visit the event Web site at www.bicyclesbattlingcancer.org. Questions can be directed to Holly Maki at holly.maki@cancer.org or by calling 603.471.4124. Look for me at the registration area when you arrive!

group.name: Boston Metro Hike Bike & Social Club

item.name: Help fight cancer! Ride in the American Cancer Society Bicycles Battling Cancer!
